scripts.check:grpc-versions: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const out=JSON.parse(require('child_process').execSync('npm ls @grpc/grpc-js --json').toString()||'{}'); const versions=new Set(); function scan(n){ if(!n||!n.dependencies) return; Object.keys(n.dependencies).forEach(k=>{ const d=n.dependencies[k]; if(k==='@grpc/grpc-js'){ versions.add(d.version); } scan(d); }); } scan(out); console.log('grpc versions:', [...versions].join(', ')); if(versions.size>1){ console.error('Multiple versions found'); process.exit(1);} "
